articles.author: Vatsal Vora
articles.title: Is Cristiano Ronaldo playing for Al-Nassr against Al-Fateh tonight? - Sportskeeda
articles.description: Cristiano Ronaldo is expected to start when Al-Nassr travel to Al-Fateh in the Saudi Pro League on Friday (August 25).

articles.author: TIMESOFINDIA.COM
articles.title: Tennis star Rafael Nadal says, “very excited to join to Infosys” - Gadgets Now
articles.description: Infosys has signed tennis star Rafael Nadal as its brand ambassador. The company has entered into a three-year partnership with Nadal. Infosys has been the technology partner of the Association of Tennis Professionals (ATP) since the year 2015. The company is…
